select * from order1 where 1=1
and tableid like '%${tableid}%'
and orderid like '%${orderid}%'
and status like '%${status}%'
and status in('待点餐','待上菜') and createtime>DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
order by orderid desc
SELECT T.t, COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT *,HOUR(createtime) t FROM order1 WHERE DATE(createTime) = DATE(SYSDATE()) ) T GROUP BY T.t ORDER BY T.t
SELECT M.m, ROUND(SUM(total),2) FROM ( SELECT *,MONTH(createtime) m FROM order1 WHERE YEAR(createTime) = YEAR(SYSDATE()) ) M GROUP BY M.m ORDER BY M.m
